Header.title: Turn your MRR into instant cash
Header.paragraph: Graph enables startups to turn their MRR into a instant payout they can use for business purposes.

About.paragraph: Graph was started to help startups scale. We know how important capital is for scaling. If you have revenue you should have access to liquid cash.
Why: We help you scale without the need for you to raise more money
We give you instant access to cash
